title: Stock market news live updates: Stocks rise amid reports of progress on Russia-Ukraine ceasefire talks - Yahoo Finance
content: Stock market news live updates: Stocks rise amid reports of progress on Russia-Ukraine ceasefire talks  Yahoo Finance
description: Wall Streetâ€™s main benchmarks rallied Tuesday for a second straight day to build on a streak of recent gains as investors looked optimistically toward the possibility of a ceasefire negotiation between Russia and Ukraine.
